#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        long long int n;
        cin>>n;
        long long int q=n/26;
        //cout<<q<<endl;
        int r=n%26;
        r=r+96;

        if(r>96)
            cout<<q+1<<endl;
            else
                cout<<q<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
